title: Survey Help!
selftext:
Hello everyone, im currently working on finding the solution some social problem, which i think might positively or negativly affect our future. But i still want some pointers from the general public to understand their view point , which will boost my confidence and have a clear direction in solving this issue.   
Please take a few minutes to help out with this survey  


Survey Link below

[https://forms.gle/bk8sUbiP92eG3Ldr7](https://forms.gle/bk8sUbiP92eG3Ldr7)
